content: The Ginseng Cape is obtained upon defeating Old Ginseng Guai in the Towers of Karma area in Valley of Ecstasy in Chapter 3 - The New West.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Ginseng_Cape.md', within the main section titled 'Ginseng Cape'.
The content is as follows:
The Ginseng Cape is obtained upon defeating Old Ginseng Guai in the Towers of Karma area in Valley of Ecstasy in Chapter 3 - The New West.
